tutorial.title: TUTORIAL
tutorial.step1.title: Welcome, Commander!
tutorial.step1.pc: Use W, A, S, D to move.
tutorial.step2.title: Aim & Fire
tutorial.step2.pc: Aim is auto. Press SPACE to fire.
tutorial.step2.mobile: Aim is auto. Use the red button to fire.
tutorial.step3.title: Special Ability
tutorial.step3.pc: Press Q to use your unique ability.
tutorial.step3.mobile: Tap the ABIL button for your unique ability.
tutorial.step4.title: The Shop
tutorial.step4.pc: Use score to buy Shields. Press C for a quick buy.
tutorial.step4.mobile: Use score to buy Shields from the shop.
tutorial.step5.title: Level Up!
tutorial.step5.content: Collect blue orbs from enemies to level up, heal, and get upgrades.
tutorial.step6.title: Survive!
tutorial.step6.content: Survive as long as you can and get the high score. Good luck!
